mapper.select: select * from ( select p_name,p_price from product order by p_idx DESC) A limit #{skip},#{amount}

SELECT *, CASE WHEN p_category_idx = '1' THEN '개껌' WHEN p_category_idx = '2' THEN '스낵' WHEN p_category_idx = '3' THEN '뼈/육포' WHEN p_category_idx = '4' THEN '스틱' WHEN p_category_idx = '5' THEN '프리미엄' WHEN p_category_idx = '6' THEN '통살' WHEN p_category_idx = '7' THEN '츄르' WHEN p_category_idx = '8' THEN '스낵' WHEN p_category_idx = '9' THEN '캣잎' WHEN p_category_idx = '10' THEN '통살' WHEN p_category_idx = '11' THEN '프리미엄' WHEN p_category_idx = '12' THEN '스틱' ELSE '잉' END AS categoryName, CASE WHEN p_category_large = '1' THEN '강아지' WHEN p_category_large = '2' THEN '고양이' ELSE '잉' END AS categoryLargeName FROM p_category WHERE p_category_idx=#{p_category_idx} and p_category_large=#{p_category_large};
SELECT a.*,b.* FROM product a join product_img b on a.p_idx=b.p_idx group by a.p_idx ORDER BY a.p_idx DESC;
